name: Floral Sidewinder
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Collei, equip this card.
After Collei equips this card, immediately use Floral Brush once.
After your Collei, who has this card equipped, uses Floral Brush, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Collei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1701]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1701] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S17012]</color> once.
After your $[A1701], who has this card equipped, <color=#FFFFFFFF>uses $[S17012]</color>, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger $[K217]: Deal 1 $[K107]. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1701] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Collei</color>, equip this card.
After Collei equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Floral Brush</color> once.
After your Collei, who has this card equipped, <color=#FFFFFFFF>uses Floral Brush</color>, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger <color=#7EC236FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro-Related Reactions</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>. (Once per Round)
(You must have Collei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Never underestimate Collei, and never underestimate her cat.
source: Reward for inviting Collei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
